revised_title: Ammonite Succession and Zonal Classification in the Callovian Stage
tldr: The author examines the ammonite succession in the Lower Oxford Clay and Kellaways beds at Kidlington, Oxfordshire, and reevaluates the zones of the Callovian stage. The study provides a detailed analysis of the ammonite species found in the area, contributing to a better understanding of the geological time period and the correlation of beds across various locations in England and Europe.
